sentence.Network_en: He lost his job for allegedly being incapable.
sentence.Network_cn: 据说他由于软弱无能而丢掉了工作。

sentence.Network_en: He was a man incapable of violence.
She was a very honest person who was incapable of dissembling.
sentence.Network_cn: 她是一个非常诚实的人，不会伪装。

PerfectNetExp.abs: 《Friends》词汇表B ... neglected adj. 被忽视的 incapable adj. 无能力的, 不能的 fortieth num. 第四十, 四十分之一.
Sing Tolerant/宽容,Jeff Chang/张信哲 ... 为何 why 无法 incapable;unable 问 to ask.
普通英汉小词典_翻译家(Fanyijia.com) ... inaugurate 就任 incapable 无能的 incense 香气.
第六讲、高中英语词汇... ... （put 表述）符合句子意思。 6. 选择 （incapable 没有能力）为最佳答案。 7. 选择 （values 价值）正合 …

list.abs: 英语短语搭配 - 豆丁网 ... ignorant of （对……无知） incapable of （没有……的能力） independent of （不受……支配， 不依赖）.
The only regret is , the loose incapable ending lets piece the charm a little lose ., 唯一的遗憾是 , 松散无力的结尾让全片的魅力有点损失.
An employer cannot afford to hire incapable workers ., 一个雇主不能出钱雇用没有能力的工人.
the children seem to be totally incapable of working quietly by themselves ., 这些孩子似乎完全不能安静地自己做功课.

derivation.yuyuan_name: late 16th cent.: from French, or from late Latin incapabilis, from in- 'not' + capabilis (see capable)

entry.def: Someone who is incapable of doing something is unable to do it.

example.ex: She seemed incapable of taking decisions...
He was a man incapable of violence.

entry.def: An incapable person is weak or stupid.

example.ex: He lost his job for allegedly being incapable.
example.tran: 据说他由于软弱无能而丢掉了工作。

sentences.sentence: "he is incapable of understanding the matter"

means.word_mean: 2. not being susceptible to or admitting of something (usually followed by `of');
3. lacking the necessary skill or knowledge etc.;
4. (followed by `of') not having the temperament or inclination for;

sentences.sentence: "unequal to the demands put upon him"

auth_sentence.content: Some people are incapable of learning from the past.
auth_sentence.res_content: Some people are incapable of learning from the past.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Some people are incapable of learning from the past.

auth_sentence.content: I wanted to shout...but I seemed incapable of speech.
auth_sentence.res_content: I wanted to shout...but I seemed incapable of speech.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: I wanted to shout...but I seemed incapable of speech.

auth_sentence.content: Mugabe, however, seems incapable of giving up.
auth_sentence.res_content: Mugabe, however, seems incapable of giving up.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Mugabe, however, seems incapable of giving up.

stems_affixes.type_exp: 1. 表示"向内,成为,进入,使……"; 2. 表示"不,无,非"

stems_affixes.word_buile: in向内,成为,进入,使……+born出生的→adj.天生的
in向内,成为,进入,使……+cent唱歌+ive……的→把精神唱进去→激励
in向内,成为,进入,使……+cis=cise切+ive……的→切入→入木三分
in向内,成为,进入,使……+door门→门内的
in向内,成为,进入,使……+spir呼吸+ed的→有呼吸的→有生命的
in不,无,非+visible看得见的→adj.看不见的, 无形的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 效率低的, 效率差的
stems_affixes.word_buile: in不,无,非+efficient有效的→adj.效率低的, 效率差的
in不,无,非+accurate正确的→adj.错误的, 不准确的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 无行动的, 不活动的
stems_affixes.word_buile: in不,无,非+active积极的→adj.无行动的, 不活动的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 不充分的, 不适当的
stems_affixes.word_buile: in不,无,非+adequate足够的→adj.不充分的, 不适当的
in不,无,非+calculable可计算的→adj.不可计算的
in不,无,非+capable有能力的→adj.无能力的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 不完全的, 不完善的
stems_affixes.word_buile: in不,无,非+complete完全的,圆满的→adj.不完全的, 不完善的
in不,无,非+constant稳定的→adj.多变的,无常的
in不,无,非+convenient便利的→adj.不便的, 有困难的
in不,无,非+corrigible可改正的→adj.积习难改的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 不明确的;不定的,模糊的
stems_affixes.word_buile: in不,无,非+definite明确的→adj.不明确的;不定的,模糊的
in不,无,非+different不同的→同与不同的"事不关已"→冷漠的
in不,无,非+dign高贵+ant……的→[因发脾气]不高贵的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 不可避免的, 必然的
stems_affixes.word_buile: in不,无,非+evitable可避免的→adj.不可避免的, 必然的
in不,无,非+human人道的→adj.不人道的
in不,无,非+imit模仿+able可以……的→不能模仿的
in不,无,非+justice公正→adj.不公正
in不,无,非+noc毒害+ous……的→无害的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 无意义的,低微的,微不足道的
stems_affixes.word_buile: in不,无,非+significant有意义的→adj.无意义的,低微的,微不足道的
in不,无,非+glor光荣+ious……的→不光荣的
in不,无,非+temperate自制的→adj.放纵的
in不,无,非+variable易变的;变量→adj.不变的, 永恒的 n.不变量
indoor[adj.户内的]+s→adv.在户内
in向内,成为,进入,使……+curs跑+ion表名词→跑入→侵犯
in不,无,非+accuracy准确→n.错误
in不,无,非+difference不同→不不同→没什么不同,没什么了不起→冷漠,无足轻重
indifference[n. 不关心,冷漠,无足轻重]→n.漠不关心, 不在乎
in不,无,非+stability稳定→n.不稳定[性]
in不,无,非+significance意义→n.无意义
in不,无,非+variable易变的;变量→adj.不变的, 永恒的 n.不变量
in向内,成为,进入,使……+put放→n.&v.输入
in向内,成为,进入,使……+augur=augury预兆,开始+ate表动词→进入开始→就职;参考:augury预兆
in向内,成为,进入,使……+corpor团体+ate表动词→v.合并
in向内,成为,进入,使……+flame火焰→v.使燃烧;激怒
in向内,成为,进入,使……+hale气→进气,吸气
in向内,成为,进入,使……+vigor活力+ate表动词→v.鼓舞,激励

sentences.en: those incapable of supporting themselves by reason of age and infirmity
sentences.cn: 那些因为年迈体衰而不能养活自己的人

sentences.en: The injured man was incapable of walking,so he had to be carried.
sentences.cn: 那个受伤的人不能行走,因此必须抬着。

sentences.en: The wine had made him incapable of thinking clearly.
sentences.cn: 葡萄酒下肚，他就无法清醒地思考了。

sentences.en: The company seems to be incapable of hanging on to its staff.
sentences.cn: 公司似乎无力留住职员。

sentences.en: The Foreign Minister refuted the assertion that the developing countries are incapable of managing their industries.
sentences.cn: 外交部长驳斥了发展中国家没有能力管理本国工业的谬论。

sentences.en: Computers are incapable of creative thought.
sentences.cn: 计算机不会创造性地思维。

sentences.en: He would be incapable of committing such a cruel deed.
sentences.cn: 他不会做出这么残忍的事。
